## Source: ossf-package-analysis (b86b90f2ffa63945be2355f5639543a032f0a57ea59dabe377573e35e9d6507b)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'openkitjs-simple-sample' @ 1.0.1 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
